sentences.en: He had plastic surgery to help reconstruct his badly damaged face.
sentences.cn: 他做了整形手术以修复其严重受伤的面部。

sentences.en: He has been left hideously disfigured by plastic surgery.
sentences.cn: 整形外科手术导致他完全毁容了。

sentences.en: He has received extensive corrective surgery to his skull.
sentences.cn: 他的头骨做过大面积的矫形手术。

sentences.en: He needed surgery to cure a troublesome back injury.
sentences.cn: 他需要做手术来治好烦人的背伤。

sentences.en: His doctor had told him to prepare himself for surgery.
sentences.cn: 他的医生已经告诉他做好动手术的准备。

sentences.en: I have doubts about the advisability of surgery in this case.
sentences.cn: 关于该病例做手术的可行性，我持有疑问。

sentences.en: I was already prepped for surgery so I went straight into theatre.
sentences.cn: 我已经做好了接受外科手术的准备，于是就直接进入了手术室。

sentences.en: If the cortisone doesn't take, I may have to have surgery.
sentences.cn: 如果可的松无效，我恐怕只能动手术了。

sentences.en: Many people find the idea of any kind of invasive surgery unbearable.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为任何开刀手术都不堪忍受。

sentences.en: Once the damage is done, even modern surgery can't undo it entirely.
sentences.cn: 伤害一旦造成，即使是现代外科手术也无法将其完全消除。

sentences.en: Only 12 weeks ago he underwent major heart transplant surgery.
sentences.cn: 12个星期前他才刚刚接受了风险很高的心脏移植手术。

sentences.en: Ophthalmic surgeons are now performing laser surgery to correct myopia.
sentences.cn: 眼科医生现在采用激光手术来矫正近视。

sentences.en: She even had plastic surgery to change the shape of her nose.
sentences.cn: 为改变鼻子的形状，她甚至接受了整形手术。

sentences.en: Shockingly, this useless and dangerous surgery did not end until the 1930s.
sentences.cn: 令人震惊的是，这种既无效又危险的手术直到20世纪30年代才被废止。

sentences.en: This type of surgery could even be used to extract cancerous growths.
sentences.cn: 这种外科手术甚至可以用来切除癌性肿瘤。
